person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Bill Jordan , general secretary of the International Confederation of Free Trade Unions ( ICFTU ) , told a news conference the withdrawal of a WTO invitation to ILO director general Michel Hansenne was " outrageous behaviour on the part of an organisation that wants to command respect in the world " .

Let's think step by step.

1. Bill Jordan - general secretary of the International Confederation of Free Trade Unions (ICFTU)
2. International Confederation of Free Trade Unions (ICFTU)
3. WTO (implied)
4. ILO (implied)
5. Michel Hansenne - director general of ILO

These are the "Person" entities in the given paragraph. Some entities are implied and not explicitly mentioned, but they can be inferred from the context.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Person.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

organization.content:
Please identify the "Organization" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Bill Jordan , general secretary of the International Confederation of Free Trade Unions ( ICFTU ) , told a news conference the withdrawal of a WTO invitation to ILO director general Michel Hansenne was " outrageous behaviour on the part of an organisation that wants to command respect in the world " .

Let's think step by step.

1. The first organization mentioned in the paragraph is the "International Confederation of Free Trade Unions (ICFTU)". This is the organization for which Bill Jordan serves as general secretary.

2. The second organization mentioned is the "WTO" (World Trade Organization). The WTO is the organization that withdrew an invitation to ILO director general Michel Hansenne.

3. The third organization mentioned is the "ILO" (International Labour Organization). Michel Hansenne is the director general of this organization.

So, the "Organization" entities in the paragraph are:

* International Confederation of Free Trade Unions (ICFTU)
* WTO (World Trade Organization)
* ILO (International Labour Organization)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Organization.

1. The International Confederation of Free Trade Unions (ICFTU) is an organization, as it is a global federation of trade unions.
2. The World Trade Organization (WTO) is an organization, as it is an intergovernmental organization that regulates international trade.
3. The International Labour Organization (ILO) is an organization, as it is a United Nations agency dealing with labour issues.

Therefore, the relevant entities that clearly refer to Organizations are:

* International Confederation of Free Trade Unions (ICFTU)
* WTO (World Trade Organization)
* ILO (International Labour Organization)

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Organization".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Organization |
| --- |
| International Confederation of Free Trade Unions (ICFTU) |
| WTO (World Trade Organization) |
| ILO (International Labour Organization) |
